name: RDSSecurityGroupRule
description: The Amazon RDS security group rule is an embedded property of the AWS::RDS::DBSecurityGroup type.

properties.name: EC2SecurityGroupId
properties.description: Id of the VPC or EC2 Security Group to authorize.

properties.name: EC2SecurityGroupName
properties.description: Name of the EC2 Security Group to authorize.

properties.name: EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId
properties.description: AWS Account Number of the owner of the EC2 Security Group specified in the EC2SecurityGroupName parameter. The AWS Access Key ID is not an acceptable value.
